evidence.claim: Oyster utilizes Amazon Web Services for cloud infrastructure and data storage.
The platform's architecture embraces microservices and RESTful APIs for seamless integration between services.
Oyster is committed to HIPAA compliance to ensure privacy and security of health-related data.
Oyster follows FHIR standards for health data transactions.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transactions or clearinghouse operations found.
